item.title: RuneJava safezones - Please help if you know, I am kinda frusterated
item.dc:creator: @R_Y_A_N R Y A N
item.description:
@R_Y_A_N wrote:

[quote=“R Y A N, post:2, topic:200044”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=264705.msg2188306#msg2188306 date=1208249117]
ok guys I know how to add safezones but when i search for the public boolean nonwild or nonwild or safezone I get nothing. RuneJava has no safezones to start with. Where can I add the boolean or the other things?
[/quote]ehm ok… go to your client.java and search public void checkwildy() { or something like that

you should see something like this:

public void checkwildy() { if((absX >= 2806 && absX <= 2812 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3442)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if((absX >= 2806 && absX <= 2812 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3442)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

if you want everywere to be safe replace it with this

[code]public void checkwildy()
{
if((absX >= 2518 && absX <= 2531 && absY >= 4767 && absY <= 4786))
{
inwildy = true;
}
if((absX <= 2367 && absX >= 2434 && absY <= 3071 && absY >= 3137))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = false;
}
}

public void checkwildy2()
{
if((absX >= 2518 && absX <= 2531 && absY >= 4767 && absY <= 4786))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
if((absX >= 2518 && absX <= 2531 && absY >= 4767 && absY <= 4786))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
if((absX >= 2367 && absX <= 2434 && absY >= 3071 && absY <= 3137))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
}[/code] and your done. not that hard right gl with it.[/quote]

??

Read full topic

@chassy13 wrote:

yeah i did it still lets me attack people. Ill show you where i set the safe zone up.

Legend:

Yellow Dot: Me

Red Lines: Safe Zone

ff.jpg642×552

It says Danger instead of Safe on the skull :\

I have been trying to figure it out for 2 hours now and I dont know whats wrong…

I used what the guide said, about the coords for the north-east corner and southwestc orner, made sure to do it right, everything…I just don’t get whats wrong :\

item.title: RuneJava safezones - Please help if you know, I am kinda frusterated
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, I have been trying to add safezones, but in the tutorials im following where it says:

search for:

safezone

or public boolean nonWildy…or anything like that…RuneJava does not have it. I am not sure if this is what they use for safezones, but the coords that are there is the home spot, which was the catherby bank, which is a safezone. I am just not sure how to add it to RuneJava…

Here is what they use, I think. They only have voids though. This is my first server btw so I am not the smartest with this :

public void checkwildy() { if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if((absX >= 2806 && absX <= 2812 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3442)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

I have the coords correct but its not a safezone…I changed checkwildy()'s old coords on the 1st one to mine, but left the checkwildy2()'s the same as they were.

If ANYONE can please help me on how to add safezones on RuneJava, I would GREATLY appreciate it.

Read full topic
